label: 五戒
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Also read gokai." The Buddhist prohibitions against killing, stealing, fornication, deceit, and drunkenness.  These simple rules of conduct could be upheld by a layman or a novice (nyûdô), but for fully ordained monks and nuns there were many more.[入道][RK]"
